        • menuDisplayed

          int menuDisplayed
          Allows us to know which screen has to be displayed by looking at the value 0 - main menu displayed 1 - parameters displayed 2 - level selection displayed 3 - level displayed 4 - game over screen displayed 5 - victory screen displayed

          Is the game running
